publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4112 Mr Brian Monteith: The Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2006 (SSI 2006/92).

S2M-4112 Mr Brian Monteith: The Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2006 (SSI 2006/92).
